questions.question: f all the light passes through a solution without any absorption, then the value of absorbance is _______ and per cent transmittance is _______.
The units of absorbance and molar absorptivity are ________ and _______ respectively

answers.b: L mol<sup>-1</sup> cm<sup>-1</sup> and mol<sup>-1</sup> cm<sup>-1</sup>
answers.d: L mol cm and L mol<sup>-1</sup> cm<sup>-1</sup>
